full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 379 Filed 10/28/21 Page 2 of 2
the entry requirements established by the questionnaire and whose temperatures are below 100.4 degrees will be allowed to enter the courthouse. All visitors must wear a mask that covers the person's nose and mouth. Bandannas, gaiters, and masks with valves are not permitted. If a person does not have an approved mask, a screener will provide one. Anyone who fails to comply with the COVID-19 protocols that have been adopted by the Court will be required to leave the courthouse. There are no exceptions. For more information, please see https://www.nysd.uscourts.gov/covid-19-coronavirus.
SO ORDERED.
Dated: October 28, 2021 New York, New York
ALISON J. NATHAN United States District Judge

additional_notes: The document is a court order regarding COVID-19 protocols in the courthouse. It is signed by Judge Alison J. Nathan.
